item.title: Introduction
item.description: The Virtual Reality (VR) teleoperation application enables you to control the robot remotely with VR device. By connecting to your robot, the teleoperation application gives you the ability to move Reachy’s arm with the tracking of the VR controllers, to rotate Reachy’s head following your own head movements and to see through Reachy’s cameras. You can also manipulate objects remotely controlling Reachy’s grippers with your controllers' triggers.
